title: God's Daily Guidance for Israel
description:
Readings from:
Numbers 9:15-23
Today's passages were read by Marc Therrien is a Director of workcampNE, a New England based missions organization that mobilizes teens to serve the community through free home repairs.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
